name: Judge Dredd (1998)
description: You are the law. In the 22nd century, every day is judgement day. Criminals thrive in vast, domed megacities - facing no police force or court of law... just the lone justice of street-prowling judges. Now an ex-judge-turned-prisoner has escaped and taken the mayor hostage. Leading an army of merciless androids, he's determined to go holster-to-holster against only you... the last word in justice... Judge Dredd.
